title: Effects of Trade in the Indian Ocean 1200-1450 SAQ

content.question: Answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE way that technological changes facilitated trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450. b) Explain ONE way that trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450 led to political change. c) Explain ONE way that trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450 led to cultural change.

frqParts.text: Answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE way that technological changes facilitated trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450. b) Explain ONE way that trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450 led to political change. c) Explain ONE way that trade in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200–1450 led to cultural change.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
